response.overview: Beaten down from an unexpected rejection from college, Jensen is stuck between the hold of his nostalgic past and the loss of his idyllic imagined future. With the aid of his friends, family, and the elusive Taylor Ham sandwich, he finds peace by looking outward to gain perspective on the world's greater problems and inward to remember how he's surmounted far more difficult tragedies before and will do so time and time again.
response.title: Curveball!
